# dividerIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the split view divider to align with the tracking separator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var dividerIndex: Int { get set }
```

## configuring a tracking separator

- **splitView**: The vertical split view to align with the toolbar separator.
